products.tabDescription: Pokémon Legends: Z-A is the next big step in the legendary Pokémon series, bringing players into a dynamic, living Lumiose City filled with action, adventure, and discovery. For the first time ever in a Pokémon RPG, you’ll take direct command of your Pokémon in exciting real-time battles — mastering timing, positioning, and strategy to overcome powerful opponents. The world centers around the stunning Prism Tower, where Trainers can explore shops, restaurants, and wild zones teeming with Pokémon ready to catch and battle. Mega Evolution makes a dramatic comeback, allowing your team to reach new heights in combat against the mysterious Rogue Mega-Evolved Pokémon that threaten the city. By day, train and bond with your Pokémon; by night, compete in the Z-A Royale — the ultimate test of skill and endurance. Along your journey, you’ll encounter fascinating characters such as AZ, the enigmatic owner of Hotel Z, and Team MZ, who seek to maintain peace across Lumiose. Pokémon Legends: Z-A combines deep storytelling, real-time action, and stunning visuals for the most immersive Pokémon adventure yet. Whether you’re battling online, exploring hidden areas, or mastering Mega Evolution, this game is a must-have for every Nintendo Switch gamer. Don’t miss out — pre-order now and be among the first Trainers to begin your legend in Pokémon Legends: Z-A.
